system.description:
Also at 10th level, you have advantage on checks to determine if a creature is being truthful with you. This check does not determine if the creature is holding anything back or what the truth might be; it is only good for detecting willful deception.

You also gain an expertise die on saves against spells of the illusion and enchantment schools, as well as any effect that would cause you to become charmed, confused, put you to sleep, or dictate your actions (such as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bs1zn1s8ewwa4tfx]{Command} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.9s4sb34j24r74328]{Dominate Person}).
